pr_title: Fixed an issue where a new entry is not shown in the library if a filter/search is active

timeline.message: Fixed an issue where a new entry is not shown in the library if a filter is active

timeline.bodyText:
A better solution would be to Inject the StateManager and call
clearSearchQuery
(For how to inject see for example the LinkedFileEditDialogView dialog)
timeline.author: Siedlerchr
